title: Buying RP in a foreign region ?
body:
So, I have just moved from Brazil into EUW ( Portugal ) and have a Brazilian account, in which I desired to Purchase RP so that I could transfer to the EUW server.

When I go into the Purchase RP, _( for Portugal, in the BR account )_, It shows **international card and Prepaid RP** card as options, Will buying a **RP card here in Portugal **and using it in my _Brazilian account  work ? If the _**Brazilian account is being used in Portugal ?**
Anyone got any experience with this ? 

**THANKS.** {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Using payment methods for one region typically won't work on another. If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we can work with you to sort this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
